ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspeqvlco.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_lcosslsp | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B ) -> ( M LinCo V ) C_ ( ( LSpan ` M ) ` V ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_lspsslco | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B ) -> ( ( LSpan ` M ) ` V ) C_ ( M LinCo V ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqssd | |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B ) -> ( M LinCo V ) = ( ( LSpan ` M ) ` V ) ) |
